name: Splinters of Regret
description:
Splinters of Regret is a student-made, action bullet hell where you play as a person imprisoned for the sinful acts they've done in life. In this land of regrets, face against manifestations of other people's regrets as you make your way through the levels.

Splintering
Use the power of Splintering to blow away enemies around you. In this state, you are vulnerable and must dodge attacks within the time limit. Taking too many hits means game over.

Items and Artifacts
Use a variety of items and artifacts that you come across to help you in battle against the creatures.
